title: #218 - Joe DeRosa & ME
description:
Comedian Joe DeRosa & I hang out in the Mancave and talk about booze, fatty livers, hopping on the wagon, the arrogance of political elitists, Lisa Lampanelli, Amy Schumer, his salad days in the NYC comedy scene PLUS a BONUS at the end of the podcast - my wife LeeAnn and I breakdown the first episode of the last season of Black Sails!

 

To get my book "Life of the Party" click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

 

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
